###Load data and packages

```{r}
pfi <- read.csv("GitHub/PFI/data/PFI_clean.csv")
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
yields <- pfi %>%
  filter(item_type %in% c("Expense"), farmer == "Thompson") %>% 
  spread(item, value) %>% 
  select(-c(5))

yields <- yields %>% mutate(year_before = year - 1) %>%
  left_join(select(yields, 1:4), 
            by=c("field_id" = "field_id", "year_before" = "year")) %>%
  select(-c(2,38))

# Get crop yields
value <- pfi %>% 
  filter(item_type %in% c("Unit Quantity"), farmer == "Thompson") %>%
  select(c(1,3,7))

# Add crop yields to yields df
yields <- yields %>% 
  left_join(value, by = c("field_id" = "field_id", "year" = "year")) %>%
  mutate(yield = value) %>% select(-38)

# Reorder variables
yields <- yields[,c(2,1,3,4,37,38,5:36)]
```
